Monthly core measures

Source: vignettes/metadata-monthly.Rmd
metadata-monthly.Rmd

Note: This package currently only provides metadata for the most recent monthly reporting period.

ID Description
M001 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period
M002 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'self'
M003 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'General Medical Practitioner Practice'
M004 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Health Visitor'
M345 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Maternity Service’
M005 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Other Primary Health Care'
M006 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Carer/Relative’
M007 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Local Authority Services and Other Public Services'
M008 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Employer’
M009 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Justice System’
M010 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Child Health’
M011 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Independent/Voluntary Sector’
M012 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Acute Secondary Care'
M013 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of 'Other Mental Health NHS Trust'
M014 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Internal’
M017 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Other'
M018 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Improving access to psychological therapies’
M287 Count of referrals with a referral request received date in the reporting period with a source of referral for mental health of ‘Mental Health Drop In Service’
M019 Count of open referrals with no activity at end of the reporting period for fewer than 61 days
M020 Count of open referrals with no activity at end of the reporting period for between 61 to 90 days
M021 Count of open referrals with no activity at end of the reporting period for between 91 to 120 days
M022 Count of open referrals with no activity at end of the reporting period for more than 120 days
M023 Count of referrals with first assessment in the reporting period
M024 Count of referrals that waited fewer than 29 days for first assessment
M025 Count of referrals that waited between 29 to 56 days for first assessment
M026 Count of referrals that waited between 57 and 90 days for first assessment
M027 Count of referrals that waited more than 90 days for first assessment
M028 Count of referrals that with an end date before first assessment
M029 Count of referrals yet to have a first assessment at the end of the reporting period
M030 Count of referrals yet to have a first assessment who have been waiting over 90 days at the end of the reporting period
M031 Count of referrals with a first treatment care contact (accessed services) in the reporting period
M032 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited fewer than 29 days for first treatment
M033 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited between 29 and 56 days for first treatment
M034 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited between 57 and 90 days for first treatment
M035 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited over 90 days for first treatment
M036 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited 42 days or less for first treatment
M037 Count of referrals that accessed services in the period that waited 126 days or less for first treatment
M038 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment at the end of the reporting period
M039 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting 0 to 2 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M040 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting 0 to 4 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M041 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting 0 to 6 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M042 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting 0 to 12 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M043 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting 0 to 18 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M044 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting over 18 weeks at the end of the reporting period
M045 Count of referrals yet to have a first treatment who have been waiting over 90 days at the end of the reporting period
M046 Count of referrals that waited over 28 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period)
M047 Count of referrals that waited over 90 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period)
M121 Count of referrals that waited fewer than 29 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period)
M122 Count of referrals that waited between 29 to 90 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period)
M123 Proportion of referrals that waited fewer than 29 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period) expressed as a percentage
M124 Proportion of referrals that waited over 28 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period) expressed as a percentage
M125 Proportion of referrals that waited between 29 to 56 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period) expressed as a percentage
M126 Proportion of referrals that waited over 90 days between first and second treatment appointment (where the second treatment appointment occurred within the reporting period) expressed as a percentage
M048 Mean waiting time in days between the referral request received date and the date of first treatment appointment, where the referral accessed services in the reporting period
M049 Median waiting time in days between the referral request received date and the date of first treatment appointment, where the referral accessed services in the reporting period
M050 Mean waiting time in days between the referral received date and the date of first treatment appointment, where the referral finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M051 Median waiting time in days between the referral received date and the date of first treatment appointment, where the referral finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M052 Count of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period waiting 42 days or less for first treatment
M053 Proportion of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period that waited 42 days or less for first treatment expressed as a percentage
M054 Count of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period waiting 126 days or less for first treatment
M055 Proportion of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period that waited 126 days or less for first treatment expressed as a percentage
M056 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period
M057 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of 'Not suitable for IAPT service - no action taken or directed back to referrer’
M058 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Not suitable for IAPT service - signposted elsewhere with mutual agreement of patient’
M059 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of 'Discharged by mutual agreement following advice and support'
M060 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of 'Referred to another therapy service by mutual agreement'
M061 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of 'Suitable for IAPT service, but patient declined treatment that was offered'
M062 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Deceased (Seen but not taken on for a course of treatment)’
M063 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of 'Not known (Seen but not taken on for a course of treatment)'
M066 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period - Improving Access to Psychological Therapies care spell end code is 'Mutually agreed completion of treatment’
M069 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Deceased (Seen and taken on for a course of treatment)’
M070 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Not Known (Seen and taken on for a course of treatment)’
M340 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Incomplete Assessment (Patient dropped out)’
M341 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Termination of treatment earlier than patient requested’
M342 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Not assessed’
M344 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an end code of ‘Termination of treatment earlier than Care Professional planned’
M071 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with an invalid end code
M072 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period with no recorded end code
M073 Count of referrals that ended in the reporting period that had no appointments
M074 Count of referrals with an end date in the period having at least one appointment, but no treatment appointments (excluding follow up)
M077 Proportion of referrals with an end date in the reporting period before treatment expressed as a percentage
M078 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the reporting period that had a single treatment appointment (excluding follow up) expressed as a percentage
M153 Count of referrals with an end date in the period before treatment
M075 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that had a single treatment appointment (excluding follow up)
M288 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the reporting period that only had a single treatment appointment expressed as a percentage of all discharged referrals in the reporting period that were treated, i.e. 100 x M075 / (M056 - M153)
M076 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that had at least two treatment sessions (excluding follow up)
M079 Proportion of ended referrals with a discharge date in the period that had at least two treatment sessions (excluding follow up)
M080 Proportion of ended referrals with a discharge date in the period that had at least one treatment session (excluding follow up)
M081 Ended referrals with a discharge date in the period that completed treatments (had at least two treatment sessions (excluding follow up) as a proportion of referrals that had more than one treatment sessions (excluding follow up).
M082 Count of appointments in the reporting period
M083 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Appointment cancelled by, or on behalf of the patient’
M084 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Did not attend, no advance warning given’
M085 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Appointment cancelled or postponed by the health care provider’
M086 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Attended on time or, if late, before the relevant professional was ready to see the patient’
M087 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Arrived late, after the relevant professional was ready to see the patient, but was seen’
M088 Count of appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is ‘Patient arrived late and could not be seen’
M089 Count of treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period after at least two treatments
M343 Count of Internet enabled therapy sessions in the reporting period based on one completed weekly log being treated as one attended Internet Enabled Therapy session.
M090 Count of Guided Self Help (Book) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M091 Count of Non - Guided Self Help (Book) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M092 Count of Guided Self Help (Computer) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M093 Count of Non - Guided Self Help (Computer) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M095 Count of Structured Physical Activity treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M097 Count of Psychoeducational Peer Support treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M098 Count of Other Low Intensity treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M099 Count of Employment Support treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned. The Employment Support appointments must also be recorded as treatment appointments between the start and end dates of the referral (or end of the reporting period if the end date is not set) or as a follow up appointment after the referral end date.
M346 Count of Community Sign-posting treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M347 Average number of days waited between assessment date and first treatment where high intensity therapy was given in the first set of two or more therapy sessions with the same intensity. The measure is limited to referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M348 Average days waited between assessment date and first appointment where low intensity therapy was given in the first set of two or more therapy sessions with the same intensity. The measure is limited to referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M349 Average days waited between the last appointment where high intensity therapy was given as a sequence of two or more appointments and the first appointment in a sequence of low intensity therapy. The measure is limited to referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M350 Average days waited between the last appointment where low intensity therapy was given as a sequence of two or more appointments and the first appointment in a sequence of high intensity therapy. The measure is limited to referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period
M351 Mean of days waited between treatment appointments.
M100 Count of Applied Relaxation treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M102 Count of Couples Therapy for Depression treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M103 Count of Collaborative Care treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M104 Count of Counselling for Depression treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M105 Count of Brief Psychodynamic Psychotherapy (BPD) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M106 Count of Eye Movement Desensitisation Reprocessing treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M107 Count of Mindfulness treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M108 Count of Other High Intensity treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M110 Count of Cognitive Behaviour Therapy (CBT) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M111 Count of Interpersonal Psycho Therapy (IPT) treatment appointments in the reporting period where attended or did not attend code is 'attended on time' or 'arrived late but was seen' or the care contact was unplanned.
M112 Mean number of High Intensity treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one high intensity appointment.
M113 Mean number of Cognitive Behaviour Therapy (CBT) treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one CBT appointment.
M114 Mean number of Brief psychodynamic Psychotherapy (BPD) treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one BPD appointment.
M115 Mean number of Counselling for Depression treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one Counselling for Depression appointment.
M116 Mean number of Interpersonal Psychotherapy (IPT) treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one IPT appointment.
M117 Mean number of Couples Therapy for Depression treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatment that had at least one Couples Therapy for Depression appointment.
M119 Mean number of Other High Intensity treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatmentthat had at least one Other High Intensity appointment.
M120 Mean number of Low Intensity treatment appointments for referrals with an end date in the reporting period having finished a course of treatmentthat had at least one low intensity appointment.
M141 Mean number of treatment appointments for referrals with a discharge date in the period after at least two treatments
M142 Median number of treatment appointments for referrals with a discharge date in the period after at least two treatments
M143 Maximum number of treatment appointments for referrals with a discharge date in the period after at least two treatments
M144 Minimum number of treatment appointments for referrals with a discharge date in the period after at least two treatments
M179 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment where the service user was not at caseness at initial assessment.
M180 Proportion of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the period where the service user was not at caseness at first valid recorded score, expressed as a percentage.
M184 Count of referrals with a second treatment appointment in the reporting period
M185 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and show reliable improvement
M186 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment that showed reliable improvement expressed as a percentage
M187 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and show no reliable change.
M189 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and show reliable deterioration.
M191 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment where the service user moved to recovery
M192 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment where the service user moved to recovery expressed as a percentage. Denominator is count of referrals finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment.
M193 Count of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement).
M195 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment.
M196 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had only one anxiety measure or General Anxiety Disorder score recorded.
M197 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had no anxiety measures or General Anxiety Disorder scores recorded.
M198 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had paired anxiety measures or General Anxiety Disorder scores recorded.
M199 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had only one PHQ-9 score recorded. 
M200 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had no PHQ9 scores recorded.
M201 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had paired PHQ9 scores recorded.
M202 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had paired anxiety measures or General Anxiety Disorder scores and PHQ9 scores recorded.
M203 Count of referrals that finished a course of treatment in the reporting period and had an Anxiety Disorder Specific Measure (ADSM) related problem descriptor recorded.
M204 Count of referrals with an end date in the reporting period that finished a course of treatment and had appropriate paired Anxiety Disorder Specific Measure (ADSM) scores for the problem descriptor recorded.
M205 Proportion of referrals with an Anxiety Disorder Specific Measure (ADSM) related problem descriptor in the reporting period that had appropriate paired ADSM scores for that specific problem descriptor, expressed as a percentage.
M206 Proportion of referrals where the Ethinic Group was White with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals where the Ethinic Group was White finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment for patient.
M207 Proportion of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Asian or Asian British with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Asian or Asian British finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment for patient.
M208 Proportion of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Black or Black British with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Black or Black British finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment for patient.
M209 Proportion of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Mixed with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Mixed finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment for patient.
M210 Proportion of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Other with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment and showed reliable recovery (service user moved to recovery and shown reliable improvement). Denominator is count of referrals where the Ethinic Group was Other finishing in the period minus those finishing a course of treatment who were not at caseness at initial assessment for patient.
M212 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment and had at least 2 scores on the WSAS - Work dimension. This measure is only calculated for clinical therapy appointments therefore employment support appointments have been excluded.
M213 Mean of first recorded WSAS Work dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Work dimension.
M214 Median of first recorded WSAS Work dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Work dimension.
M215 Mean of last recorded WSAS Work dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Work dimension.
M216 Median of last recorded WSAS Work dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Work dimension.
M217 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment and had at least 2 scores on the WSAS - Home Management dimension. This measure is only calculated for clinical therapy appointments therefore employment support appointments have been excluded.
M218 Mean of first recorded WSAS Home Management dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Home Management dimension.
M219 Median of first recorded WSAS Home Management dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Home Management dimension.
M220 Mean of last recorded WSAS Home Management dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Home Management dimension.
M221 Median of last recorded WSAS Home Management dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Home Management dimension.
M222 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment and had at least 2 scores on the WSAS - Social Leisure Activities dimension. This measure is only calculated for clinical therapy appointments therefore employment support appointments have been excluded.
M223 Mean of first recorded WSAS Social Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Social Leisure Activities dimension.
M224 Median of first recorded WSAS Social Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Social Leisure Activities dimension.
M225 Mean of last recorded WSAS Social Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Social Leisure Activities dimension.
M226 Median of last recorded WSAS Social Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Social Leisure Activities dimension.
M227 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment and had at least 2 scores on the WSAS - Private Leisure Activities dimension. This measure is only calculated for clinical therapy appointments therefore employment support appointments have been excluded.
M228 Mean of first recorded WSAS Private Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Private Leisure Activities dimension.
M229 Median of first recorded WSAS Private Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Private Leisure Activities dimension.
M230 Mean of last recorded WSAS Private Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Private Leisure Activities dimension.
M231 Median of last recorded WSAS Private Leisure Activities dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Private Leisure Activities dimension.
M232 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment and had at least 2 scores on the WSAS - Relationships dimension. This measure is only calculated for clinical therapy appointments therefore employment support appointments have been excluded.
M233 Mean of first recorded WSAS Relationships dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Relationships dimension.
M234 Median of first recorded WSAS Relationships dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Relationships dimension.
M235 Mean of last recorded WSAS Relationships dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Relationships dimension.
M236 Median of last recorded WSAS Relationships dimension score for referrals with an end date in the month that finished a course of treatment having at least two scores on the WSAS – Relationships dimension.
M237 Count of referrals with a service discharge date in the month that finished a course of treatment where patient has moved off sick pay
M1001 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Face to face communication
M1002 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Telephone
M1004 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Talk type for a person unable to speak
M1005 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Email
M1006 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Text Message (Asynchronous)
M1007 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Instant messaging (Synchronous)
M1008 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Other (not listed)
M1009 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with an invalid or unrecorded communication mechanism
M1018 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Video consultation
M1019 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Message Board (Asynchronous)
M1020 Count of attended and unplanned appointments in the reporting period with a communication mechanism of Chat Room (Synchronous)
M1010 Proportion of referrals with a discharge date in the period that finished a course of treatment that showed reliable deterioration expressed as a percentage
M1011 Proportion of attended care contacts that were flagged as having integrated treatment in the quarter expressed as a percentage.
M1012 Proportion of referrals finishing a course of treatment in the quarter that had at least one integrated care contact, expressed as a percentage.
M1013 Mean total contact time for Internet Enabled Therapy for referrals finishing a course of treatment in the quarter
M1014 Count of appointments where one or more members of staff has attained an NHS TT qualification
M1015 Count of appointments where one or more members of staff is in training for but not yet been awarded an NHS TT qualification
M1016 Count of appointments where one or more members of staff has neither attained an NHS TT qualification or is in training for one
M1017 Count of appointments where one or more members of staff has no qualification data recorded
